Title: New Brand Mall Vintage Mens Luminous Mechanical Pocket Watch Black + Chain

Retro royal crown. Classic skeleton hands. Removable chain with hook. Pendent pattern & mechanical,Comes with a high quality 7mm width Cowboy Chain,Chain Length:365mm. case diameter:47mm. Nice addition to a formal or casual dressing or colleting. Package Includes:- 1 x Pocket Watch and 1 x New Brand Mall Gift Box ,Sharp Looking, Great Details & Good Running Product Description Mechanical hand-wound movement Elegant appearance: skeleton design, insight to the movement Full luminous dial (The darker night becomes, the lighter luminous dial changes) Beautiful glass back of the watch for view of the movement With mens watch chain to attach to your shirt or pants Technical specifications Display: Analogue Movement: Mechanical Hand-wind Case material: Metal Case (Width):46 / Cm Band material: Metal Band (Length/Width): 315 / 5 mm Take Attention: Once you receive the watch: Press the crown at the top of watch, the front plate will open. Setting time: Pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. Pocket watches under our private make superb birthday or Christmas gifts, in addition to great wedding and groomsmen gifts.
